00001 public class TestStaticInheritance
00002 {
00003     public static void main(String[] args)
00004     {
00005         ClassTwo two = new ClassTwo();
00006         ClassOne one = (ClassOne)two;
00007 
00008         System.out.println("      " +
00009                            "one.static [" + one.staticMember() + "] " +
00010                            (one.staticMember() == two.staticMember() ? "==" : "!=") +
00011                            " two.static [" + two.staticMember() + "]");
00012 
00013         System.out.println("one.memberStatic [" + one.memberStatic() + "] " +
00014                            (one.memberStatic() == two.memberStatic() ? "==" : "!=") +
00015                            " two.memberStatic [" + two.memberStatic() + "]");
00016 
00017         System.out.println("      " +
00018                            "one.member [" + one.member() + "] " +
00019                            (one.member() == two.member() ? "==" : "!=") +
00020                            " two.member [" + two.member() + "]");
00021 
00022         System.out.println("      " +
00023                            "one.number [" + one.number + "] " +
00024                            (one.number == two.number ? "==" : "!=") +
00025                            " two.number [" + two.number + "]");
00026         
00027         System.out.println("      " +
00028                            "one.NUMBER [" + one.NUMBER + "] " +
00029                            (one.NUMBER == two.NUMBER ? "==" : "!=") +
00030                            " two.NUMBER [" + two.NUMBER + "]");
00031 
00032         System.out.println("one.memberNumber [" + one.memberNumber + "] " +
00033                            (one.memberNumber == two.memberNumber ? "==" : "!=") +
00034                            " two.memberNumber [" + two.memberNumber + "]");
00035 
00036         System.out.println("      " +
00037                            "one.NUMBER [" + one.NUMBER + "] " +
00038                            (one.NUMBER == ClassOne.NUMBER ? "==" : "!=") +
00039                            " ClassOne.NUMBER [" + ClassOne.NUMBER + "]");
00040 
00041         System.out.println("                 " +
00042                            "one " + (one == two ? "==" : "!=") + " two");
00043 
00044         System.out.println("one.class [" + one.getClass().getName() + "] " +
00045                            (one.getClass().equals(two.getClass()) ? "==" : "!=") +
00046                            " two.class [" + two.getClass().getName() + "]");
00047     }

00050 abstract class ClassOne
00051 {
00052     static int NUMBER = 1;
00053     int number = NUMBER;
00054     int memberNumber = 1;
00055 
00056     public static int staticMember()
00057     {
00058         return NUMBER;
00059     }
00060 
00061     public int memberStatic()
00062     {
00063         return NUMBER;
00064     }
00065 
00066     public int member()
00067     {
00068         return number;
00069     }
00070 
00071     public abstract int abstractMember();
00072 }
00073 
00074 class ClassTwo extends ClassOne
00075 {
00076     static int NUMBER = 2;
00077     int number = NUMBER;
00078     int memberNumber = 2;
00079 
00080     public static int staticMember()
00081     {
00082         return NUMBER;
00083     }
00084 
00085     public int memberStatic()
00086     {
00087         return NUMBER;
00088     }
00089 
00090     public int member()
00091     {
00092         return number;
00093     }
00094 
00095     // This is not allowed to be static; why?
00096     public int abstractMember()
00097     {
00098         return NUMBER;
00099     }
